inclusion.criterion: Pregnant patients above the age of 18 years, admitted to the hospital with HG
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: diagnosis were included in the study. HG was diagnosed on the basis of having at least one of the symptoms of ketonuria, weight loss in excess of 5% of the body weight and serious vomiting more than twice per day.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: organic diseases causing nausea and vomiting
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: experience in hypnosis, meditation and mindfulness
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: multiparous or could not be cooperative with the treatment team
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has a history of recurrent C diff infections and recent antibx use, which may trigger exclusion criteria.
